Topic.Title: why did all the stuff from my game vanish?

Posts.EditableText: i haven't done anything to delete it, and i save regularly, did my data delete itself?
Posts.HTML: i haven't done anything to delete it, and i save regularly, did my data delete itself?

Posts.EditableText: You offline or on? Or is this that your game listing vanished?
Posts.HTML: You offline or on? Or is this that your game listing vanished?

Posts.EditableText: I have the same problem myself, I'm always online by the way
Posts.HTML: I have the same problem myself, I'm always online by the way

Posts.EditableText:
I work offline. That way I control my copy. And I version my code.

The thing is, I've heard about stuff vanishing. I've also had the editor suddenly start working weird. I'm always careful to have a fallback position.
Posts.HTML:
